participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Playful and light-hearted, with a unique sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I don't like sports, but I like to watch my brother play. My favorite singer is Britney Spears. My horse never talks back to me. I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work. I like to smell my own farts.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Curious and introspective, loves exploring new ideas and experiences.
participant_2.background: My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things. To free my mind from feeling depressed, I look up at the stars at night. I enjoy spending my free time looking for interesting things to add to my collection. I've kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove. I lay awake at night so I can watch the stars.

content.text: Good, thank you. How are you today?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking!
That's great to hear! What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to watch my brother play sports, go horseback riding, and listen to music.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend my free time looking for interesting things to add to my collection.
What kind of things do you collect?
I collect all sorts of things, but my favorite collection is my collection of star charts.
That's really interesting! I've never met anyone who collects star charts before.
I know, it's a pretty unique hobby. I've been collecting them since I was a kid, and I have quite a few of them now.
That's really cool! I'm sure they're beautiful.
Thank you! I love looking at them and imagining all the different places in the universe.
That sounds really peaceful. I love looking up at the stars at night, too. It always makes me feel calm and peaceful.
Me too! I love laying in the grass at night and just looking up at the stars. It's so beautiful.
It is! I'm glad we both have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things you do.
